Name: Super Trashforce
About the game: The near future. The world is full of radwaste. Garbage and chemicals flooded even hell. Satan became angry and sent his devilish creatures to the earth to destroy people! Because of this, even the ancient secret civilization of reptilians decided to wipe mankind from the face of the earth by entering the big war. But brave and mostly crazy defenders of the Earth organized a special squad. It was called Super Trashforce! Game features: - 18 unique parody characters with different characteristics; - 5 different levels with unique enemies for each one; - Over 20 unique random bosses; - More than 44 weapons. All unexpected and crazy: from a old good shotgun to rotten fish or self-guided dildos! By the way, how about a nuclear bomb? - Funny voice overs; - Unbelievable gore effects and black humor! 4 game modes: 1) Normal Game - classic survival. Here you can earn gold skulls for open new characters; 2) Boss Survival - survival for very bad dudes, because here only bosses; 3) Last stand - tower defense with base, upgrade, buy soldiers and weapons; 4) Conquest - strategy mode. This is a real challenge for experienced players. Capture the regions, send troops, earn prestige and open Super bosses - Ancient guards. This is really tough guys! After this final battle is waiting for you... We promise, it will be difficult, but interesting!
